actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means..

official_title: A bill to amend section 6103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to inspection of income tax returns filed by persons having farm operations.

summary.text: Prohibits the examination and inspection by the Department of Agriculture of income tax returns of persons having farm operations, for the purpose of obtaining data for statistical purposes about such farm operations. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 6103(g))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to inspection of income tax returns filed by persons having farm operations.
